title: I have got ''Trying to reconnect'' message for 10 min wait on 'LOG IN' only.
body:
I have never ever before have this problem but with the new client. My connection is perfect... I keep stable 13-14 ping anytime i play. The only problem comes when I log into to game i get this ''trying to reconnect'' message for about 10 min, then it disapear and i have no any issue ever after untill i quit the client i log in again. Any time i log in its 10 mins wait. It is very anoying to wait 10 min on every log in... with no any connection issues.

I even try to download a torrent at the moment i log in. And at the same moment my client is trying to reconnect I have got stable 10 mb/s download speed with no ups or downs... STABLE !

So please don't try to tell me i have connection problem.

I would really appreciate if Riot look into this problem seriously.
I believe it is not only me.

Kind Regards,

Udyr! x)

replies.body: And thats how i get no help with no answer... Broporo just ignored me.

Even with a perfect connection, it's definitely not uncommon for networks to have problems reaching specific servers due to how your ISP is routing that connection. Before jumping to any conclusions, grab some of your recent network logs and let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. That tool can tell us what your connection was like after leaving your network, so grab a screenshot and post it here for me to look over.

http://prntscr.com/gmfsmn

i dont have problem after i log in but every time i log in takes me 10 min
